This happened to me again, but this time on Windows. Also, the NPE in the 
previous comment is a different problem.

Fixed. Here was the case:

- Workspace contains a binary project with linked resources
- Shutdown and restart
- Import a source project on top of binary project
- Crash
- Restart

The tree on disk says all the files are linked resources, but the .project file
says there are no linked resources.  When the .project file is refreshed, it
"reconciles" the changed links, and deletes the resources in the tree
representing the linked file. Then, when it tries to refresh the linked file,
it has been deleted from the tree, causing the NPE on getResourceInfo. This
case is now handled better in RefreshLocalVisitor.
